name: Spy Runner
description:
Spy Runner is an endless runner where you try to escape a never-ending office building with stolen documents while other spies are trying to stop you.
Jump, shoot and slide. the actions are simple but keep an eye on your enemies and other obstacles on your way.

Perform EPIC actions in an EPIC retro game with EPIC music.

CONTROLS

Up Arrow - Jump
Down Arrow -  Slide
Left Click - Shoot
P - Pause

INFORMATIONS

This game was made y myself in less than 48 work hours. I wandered how fast could I bring a simple concept to life. All content is homemade (except the font). 

Game made on Unity using Visual Studio.
Sound effects made on BFXR.
Music made on Beep Box.

I hope you'll enjoy this game as much as I did ! Please leave comments and ratings, those are very important to me.

Thanks for playing !
